summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganGive BackLip color goes low maintenance with Milani's Color Fetish Hydrating Lip Stain. Buildable, glossy color transforms into a semi-matte stain. Lightweight formula cushions lips with Hyaluronic Acid & Squalane for up to 8HRS of hydration, comfort & wear.*
details: DetailsFeaturesHigh-comfort*, glossy color & transforms into a semi-matte stainLightweight, non-drying* formulaUp to 8HRS of wear, hydration* & comfort**Results observed in a consumer panel surveyBenefitsMade with hydration-rich Hyaluronic acid & plant-derived SqualanePrecision doefoot tip for easy applicationCruelty-FreeMade in KoreaItem 2617879How To UseApply with the pointed doe-foot applicator for precise application, starting at the center of the lips and blending outward. For a soft matte look, blot the lips after application. For a more bold glossy look, apply a second coat until desired intensity is reached.IngredientsWater / Aqua / Eau, Trimethylsiloxyphenyl Dimethicone, Octyldodecanol, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Sorbitan Stearate, Pentylene Glycol, Ethylcellulose, Polysorbate 60, Behenyl Alcohol, Arachidyl Alcohol, Stearyl Alcohol, Squalane, Propanediol, Illicium Verum (Anise) Fruit Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Propyl Gallate, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Sorbitan Isostearate, Polyacrylate-13, Polyisobutene, Polysorbate 20, Diisostearyl Malate, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, C13-15 Alkane, Butylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Saccharin, Aluminum Hydroxide, Flavor / Aroma, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77492, CI 77499), Blue 1 (CI 42090), Red 33 (CI 17200), Yellow 6 (CI 15985).
how_to_use: Apply with the pointed doe-foot applicator for precise application, starting at the center of the lips and blending outward. For a soft matte look, blot the lips after application. For a more bold glossy look, apply a second coat until desired intensity is reached.

reviews.headline: Fave lip stain!!
reviews.comments: Saw this lip stain on a tiktok and was immediately influenced, love the way it looks.

reviews.headline: Yes, I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: This product goes on smoothly and keeps my lips moist and not dried out. I highly recommend this lip stain.

reviews.headline: Love this lip stain!
reviews.comments: It looks nice as-is when it goes on, or you can wipe it away and just leave the stain. In either case, the stain lasts me all day. It even lasted through a cookout with burgers!

reviews.headline: It turns white
reviews.comments: Ive had this for not even a month, it starts to turn white a little bit. It hasnt been in the washer, dryer, or anywhere it shouldnt be. This doesnt seem to affect its ability as a lip stain, its just very questionable and i dont know what im putting on my lips. I dont know if it's the shade color, rose rising, that has this problem, but its concerning. I dont want to be putting on moldy lip stain if this is mold. Ive tried shaking it snd pumping the wand, but the color spread and it seems like there is more.

reviews.headline: the good rating is deceiving
reviews.comments: I have no idea why people are rating this lip stain so highly. it's a terrible product. and I mean terrible. it looks bad on, it's patchy and weird. it doesn't stay like a stain at all and it has a weird texture to it. Definitely not the "holy grail" people are describing it as. probably one of if not THE worst lip stain I've ever used.

reviews.headline: Nice color but‚Ä¶.
reviews.comments: It dried out my lips really bad I will not be purchasing again.

reviews.headline: I love the color
reviews.comments: Love this ans it stays on my lips for a good period of time and it's so smooth

reviews.headline: EXACT EXACT THING AS FENTY LIP STAIN
reviews.comments: HOLY GRAIL HOLY GRAIL MJST BUY SAME FORMULA

reviews.headline: Beautiful shades but expired fast
reviews.comments: I had the shade mahogany mami. It was a beauful shade loved sheering it out for everyday wear or layering for special occations. I noticed it forming colonies of bacteria around the stopper and had to throw it out, bc it jept growing despite wiping it off. Good product but has a short shelf life, which might actually be good, bc less preservatives and chemicals? Either way had to throw it out despite having 2/3rds left.

reviews.headline: Disappointing
reviews.comments: This product has a great color is not too sticky, but it 'runs' into my face.

reviews.headline: get it
reviews.comments: I love this lip stain. I ordered the mauve mentality and the color was what I expected. It doesn't make your lips feel dried out as other lip stains do that I have tried. It just glides on so smoothly and actually feels hydrating. In fact I also ordered the milani plumping lip balm (in color jam) to go along with this lip stain and it's not even needed. The stain itself is already shiny, although it can be blotted out if you prefer, and is pretty opaque. I have tried other stains that are too transparent and need many coats or another product on top, but not this one I would definitely recommend it! I will be trying out other colors.

reviews.headline: Amazing just what I needed
reviews.comments: This is my first lip stain and I love it. I wanted a natural-looking color for my lips that wouldn't come off and this was perfect. It LEGIT lasts for hours. Idk why everyone says this doesn't last long. I put on a good hydrating lip balm first, then put this on and leave my lips alone for a min.

reviews.headline: Magnificent mauve mentality
reviews.comments: I really have been loving rhis product recently. I like to apply it on my lips, wait a minute, then blot off tje excess so i get a stain look instead of a shiny look.

reviews.headline: Eh
reviews.comments: The color is beautiful. I do find myself reapplying. Hydrating at first but as it dries down throughout the day, it makes my lips even more dry than what it started at.

reviews.headline: Eh
reviews.comments: The color is beautiful. I do find myself reapplying. Hydrating at first but as it dries down throughout the day, it makes my lips even more dry than what it started at.

reviews.headline: Not great
reviews.comments: I tried this and didn't love it so I returned it.

reviews.headline: Perfect
reviews.comments: It's amazing and I'll forever been a Milani fan because of this lip stain.

reviews.headline: Not what I expected
reviews.comments: The product goes on thin and the stain does not stay. The color was good.

reviews.headline: The product is great but color is meh.
reviews.comments: I have this in 3 other colors and wanted to get a more purple shade and I had hopes the berry would be this but it leaned heavily towards fuchsia. Everything but the shade was great and that's just my irrational dislike for pink.

reviews.headline: Great
reviews.comments: I got bitten berry and the shade is so beautiful on. Stain lasts for a long time and doesnt crack or settle.

media.headline: Great lipstain for a night out
media.caption: The four colours in the back are lipstains

media.headline: amazing texture and super long lasting!!
media.caption: rose rising applied lightly and then slightly blotted with tissue

media.headline: Alright I See You Milani!
media.caption: Wore one of the color fetish lip stain in this photo, but don't remember the name of the color.

media.headline: Love Love Love this lip stain!
media.caption: Just from my purse!

faceoff_positive.comments: it's a really smooth texture, it's like air whipped so it's very light so that makes it super buildable to your personal preference. i like to apply a thin light layer and then blot some of it off for a more natural color for my skin tone, as the color is quite bright and bold. this stuff lasts ALL DAY. i previously used the wonderskin lip tint but this product lasts even longer. i put it on at 9am at work and by 5pm it's still on my lips despite eating lunch and drinking coffee throughout the day. i love pairing it with a clear lip gloss. i got the shade rose rising and it's a super beautiful pink on me.
faceoff_positive.headline: amazing texture and super long lasting!!

faceoff_negative.comments: I usually love milani products and I was so excited to receive this for Christmas. I thought for sure this would be a great match for me and my skin tone. While the color is beautiful and it indeed is moisturizing. It falls very short as a lip "stain". I was very excited to try it as soon as I could and it looks great is moisturizing but as I don't really like the " lipstick" feel this won't work for me because I was looking for a stain because I like how a stain feels like nothing and you can definitely feel this on your lips.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not a Stain more of a moisturizing lip gloss
